gurmukhi: ਲਖਿ ਤਾਸ ਸੇਵ || ਸੰਨਯਾਸ ਦੇਵ || ਅਤਿ ਚਿੱਤ ਰੀਝ || ਹਿਤ ਫਾਸ ਬੀਝ ||੨੨੭||
transliteration: Lakh(i) Taas Sev|| Sannyaas Dev|| At(i) Chitt Reejh|| Hit Phaas Beejh||227||
translation: Dutt saw his serving nature and he was extremely pleased in his mind.227.

gurmukhi: ਕਿ ਦਿੱਖਿਓਤ ਦੱਤੰ || ਕਿ ਪਰਮੰਤਿ ਮੱਤੰ || ਸੁ ਸਰਬਤ੍ਰ ਸਾਜਾ || ਕਿ ਦਿੱਖਿਓਤ ਰਾਜਾ ੨੨੮ ||
transliteration: Ki Dikkhiot Dattan|| Ki Parmant(i) Mattan|| Su Sarbatra Saajaa|| Ki Dikkhiot Raajaa||228||
translation: He seemed to Dutt as a king of supreme intellect, bedecked with all the accomplishments.228.

gurmukhi: ਕਿ ਅਾਲੋਕ ਕਰਮੰ || ਕਿ ਸਰਬਤ੍ਰ ਧਰਮੰ || ਕਿ ਅਾਜਿੱਤ ਭੂਪੰ || ਕਿ ਰੱਤੇ ਸਰੂਪੰ ੨੨੯ ||
transliteration: Ki Aalok Karman|| Ki Sarbatra Dharman|| Ki Aajitt Bhoopan|| Ki Ratte Daroopan||229||
translation: That king was unconquerable, illustrious, elegant and respectful for all religions.229.

gurmukhi: ਕਿ ਅਾਜਾਨ ਬਾਹੰ || ਕਿ ਸਰਬਤ੍ਰ ਸਾਹੰ || ਕਿ ਧਰਮੰ ਸਰੂਪੰ || ਕਿ ਸਰਬਤ੍ਰ ਭੂਪੰ ||੨੩੦||
transliteration: Ki Aajaan Baahan|| Ki Sarbatra Saahan|| Ki Dharman Daroopan|| Ki Sarbatra Bhoopan||230||
translation: That long-armed king was virtuous and cared for all his subjects.230.

gurmukhi: ਕਿ ਸ਼ਾਹਾਨ ਸ਼ਾਹੰ || ਕਿ ਅਾਜਾਨ ਬਾਹੰ || ਕਿ ਜੋਗੇਂਦ੍ਰ ਗਾਮੀ || ਕਿ ਧਰਮੇਂਦ੍ਰ ਪਾਮੀ ||੨੩੧||
transliteration: Ki Shaahan Shaahan|| Ki Aajaan Baahan|| Ki Jogendra Gadmee|| Ki Dharmendra Paamee||231||
translation: That long-armed king was a great Sovereign, a great Yogi and a monarch of Dharma.231.

gurmukhi: ਕਿ ਰੁੱਦ੍ਰਾਰਿ ਰੂਪੰ || ਕਿ ਭੂਪਾਨ ਭੂਪੰ || ਕਿ ਅਾਦੰਗ ਜੋਗੰ || ਕਿ ਤਿਅਾਗੰਤ ਸੋਗੰ ||੨੩੨||
transliteration: Ki Rudddaar(i) Roopan|| Ki Bhoopaan Bhoopan|| Ki Aadagg Jouang|| Ki Tiaagadt Sogadg||232||
translation: That king of kings resembled the figure of Rudra; he was free from anxieties and remained absorbed in Yoga.232.

gurmukhi: ਬਿਮੋਹਿਯੋਤ ਦੇਖੀ || ਕਿ ਰਾਵੱਲ ਭੇਖੀ || ਕਿ ਸੰਨਯਾਸ ਰਾਜਾ || ਕਿ ਸਰਬਤ੍ਰ ਸਾਜਾ ||੨੩੩||
transliteration: Bimohiyot Dekhee|| Ki Raavall Bhekhee|| Ki Sannyaas Raajaa|| Ki Sarbatra Saajaa||233||
translation: Seeing him, Dutt, the king of Yogis, who was in the garb of a Rawal, and who was theking of Sannyasis, and respectable for all, he was allured towards him.233.

gurmukhi: ਕਿ ਸੰਭਾਲ ਦੇਖਾ || ਕਿ ਸੁਧ ਚੰਦ੍ਰ ਪੇਖਾ || ਕਿ ਪਾਵਿਤ੍ਰ ਕਰਮੰ || ਕਿ ਸੰਨਿਅਾਸ ਧਰਮੰ ||੨੩੪||
transliteration: Ki Sandhaal Dekhaa|| Ki Sudh Channdra Pekhaa|| Ki Paavitra Karman|| Ki Sannyaas Dharman||234||
translation: He saw him like pure moon and found him that his actions were immaculate and in accordance with Yoga.234.

gurmukhi: ਕਿ ਸੰਨਿਅਾਸ ਭੇਖੀ || ਕਿ ਅਾਧਰਮ ਦ੍ਵੈਖੀ || ਕਿ ਸਰਬਤ੍ਰ ਗਾਮੀ || ਕਿ ਧਰਮੇਸ ਧਾਮੀ ||੨੩੫||
transliteration: Ki Sannyaas Bhekhee|| Ki Aadharam Dvaikhee|| Ki Sarbatra Gadmee|| Ki Dharmes Dhaamee||235||
translation: That Sannyasi king was the destroyer of impiety, he went everywhere in his kingdom and was the abode of Dharma.235.

gurmukhi: ਕਿ ਅਾਛਿੱਜ ਜੋਗੰ || ਕਿ ਅਾਗੰਮ ਲੋਗੰ || ਕਿ ਲੰਗੋਟ ਬੰਧੰ || ਕਿ ਸਰਬਤ੍ਰ ਮੰਧੰ ||੨੩੬||
transliteration: Ki Aachhijj Jouang|| Ki Aagadm Logadg|| Ki Lanot Bandhan|| Ki Sarbatra Mandhan||236||
translation: His Yoga was indestructible and wearing his loin-cloth, he moved everywhere in his kingdom.236.

gurmukhi: ਕਿ ਅਾਛਿੱਜ ਕਰਮਾ || ਕਿ ਅਾਲੋਕ ਧਰਮਾ || ਕਿ ਅਾਦੇਸ ਕਰਤਾ || ਕਿ ਸੰਨਯਾਸ ਸਰਤਾ ||੨੩੭||
transliteration: Ki Aachhijj Karmaa|| Ki Aalok Dharmaa|| Ki Aades Kartaa|| Ki Sannyaas Sartaa||237||
translation: His action and duties were illustrious and not liable to decay; he was the commander of all and was like a stream of Sannyas.237.

gurmukhi: ਕਿ ਅਗਿਅਾਨ ਹੰਤਾ || ਕਿ ਪਾਰੰਗ ਗੰਤਾ || ਕਿ ਅਾਧਰਮ ਹੰਤਾ || ਕਿ ਸੰਨਯਾਸ ਭਕਤਾ ||੨੩੮||
transliteration: Ki Aagiaan Hantaa|| Ki Paaran Gadtaa|| Ki Aadharam Hantaa|| Ki Sannyaas Bhaktaa||238||
translation: He was the destroyer of ignorance, skilful in sciences, the destroyer of impiety and a devotee of Sannyasis.238.

gurmukhi: ਕਿ ਖੰਕਾਲ ਦਾਸੰ || ਕਿ ਸਰਬਤ੍ਰ ਭਾਸੰ || ਕਿ ਸੰਨਯਾਸ ਰਾਜੰ || ਕਿ ਸਰਬਤ੍ਰ ਸਾਜੰ ||੨੩੯||
transliteration: Ki Khankaal Daasan|| Ki Sarbatra Bhaasan|| Ki Sannyaas Raajan|| Ki Sarbatra Saajan||239||
translation: He was the servitor of the Lord, he was felt everywhere by his subjects, a king in Sannyas and he was embellished with all learnings.239.
